name: Shinto Shrine
description:
This is a short walking simulator made by a group of students in one week. 

You will be able to explore a shinto shrine in Japan during a festival taking place nearby. During your visit, you can interact with objects of the environment to perform a traditionnal ritual : Nagoshi no Harae. During this ritual you will walk though Chinowa to keep yourself away from harm.

The focus of this project was to imitate a papercraft look as to make it seem like everything that surrounds you is made of paper and cartboard.

Use ZQSD to walk around, the mouse to look and E to interact with objects.

This game was made by Bouchakour Anissa, Cnudde Morgan, Desquilbet Axelle, Lehoucq Julie, Grzegorzewski Roman and Vantorre Maxime.
